item.description:
We've had a lot of new members join this year. Whether you are new to Boston, new to our group, or haven't been to an event recently - we hope you can join us. Let's enjoy some dimsum, good company & conversation. After dimsum, we'll burn off some calories with a walk to the Boston Public Garden. The leisurely walk allows us to meet and talk to other members that were sitting at other tables. 

Also, we'll go to see a movie (optional). The movie is called Tai Chi Zero and it debuts that weekend and is playing at the Boston Commons AMC Theatre. We've also been offered 2 free comp tix to this movie from the promoters of the movie. We can randomly select the winners of these 2 tix the day of.  :D

Here is a link to the movie trailer.

http://www.variancefilms.com/taichi0filmpage.html

Here is a link to their FB page for the movie as well.

http://www.facebook.com/TaiChiZero

Parking is expensive in Boston, we recommend taking the MBTA to Chinatown.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the waiting area and will provide contact tele # also.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Welcome New Members - Dimsum, Walk & Movie (Tai Chi Zero)
